meta.title: Home - Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School

meta.content: Home - Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School

Welcome to Old Colony! Set on a rural 80-acre campus, Old Colony provides state-of-the-art technical training with a rigorous academic curriculum. A small, safe, immaculate school and meticulously maintained grounds provide the ideal environment for the development of the region’s future technicians, scholars and skilled labor force.
Old Colony Regional Vocational Technical High School
